package scenariobasedapplication.testfeature;

import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.After;
import org.junit.Before;

import java.util.*;

import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.testcasejavatemplate.SysNatTestCase;
import com.iksgmbh.sysnat.test.testTemplateContainers.scenariobasedapplication.ComplexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer;

/**
* Executable Example for TestApplication 'ScenarioBasedApplication'.
* Autogenerated by SysNat.
*/
public class TestScenario1_Test extends SysNatTestCase
{
private static final String BEHAVIOUR_ID = "TestFeature";

protected ComplexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer;

public TestScenario1_Test() {
executionInfo.register(BEHAVIOUR_ID, 2);
}

@Before
public void setUp()
{
super.setUp();
initNumberOfTestCases(2);
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer = new ComplexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer(this);
}

@After
public void shutdown()
{
if ( ! isSkipped() && executionInfo.isTestEnvironmentInitialized()) {
if (languageTemplatesCommon != null) languageTemplatesCommon.gotoStartPage();
}
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer = null;
super.shutdown();
}


@Test
@Override
public void executeTestCase()
{
try {
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.declareXXGroupForBehaviour("TestFeature");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.startNewXX("TestScenario1");
languageTemplatesCommon.defineAndCheckExecutionFilter("-");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Feature");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Scenario");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Given");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.doSomething();
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("When");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.doSomething();
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.setBddKeyword("Then");
complexInstructionTestApplication_LanguageTemplateContainer.doSomething();

closeCurrentTestCaseWithSuccess();
} catch (Throwable e) {
super.handleThrowable(e);
}
}


@Override
public List<String> getNlxxFilePathAsList()
{
List<String> toReturn = new ArrayList<>();
toReturn.add("TestFeature");
toReturn.add("TestScenario1");
return toReturn;
}

}
